name: Chakra Desiderata
description: After another of your characters uses an Elemental Burst: Gain three times the amount of Resolve as Energy consumed.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another of your characters uses an Elemental Burst:</color> Gain three times the amount of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Resolve</color> as $[K310] consumed.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another of your characters uses an Elemental Burst:</color> Gain three times the amount of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Resolve</color> as <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> consumed.
